attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 50% rate is more political dogma than revenue raising.  It is destroying the UK's premier reputation as a place to carry on financial services.  With the outflow of people leaving the county, we need to stem this flow and have taxation policy that is practical not political.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
